divs: Sighting DetailsMy dogs kept barking erratically. I let them outside to use the restroom when they continued to bark. I looked around and noticed a grey colored oval object moving over my house at slow rate of speed 30 mph or less. There was not any wind and very little cloud cover. There was not any sound and wind felt at all when the object passed my home. I was on my back porch when it went over head so I ran to the front door and the object was gone.
Summary: Dull grey object 500-100 feet over house
